events.title: Iphone 15 pro Max
events.description: The Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra is the headliner of the S23 series. Specifications are top-notch including 6.8-inch Dynamic AMOLED display with 120Hz refresh rate, Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processor, 5000mAh battery, up to 12gigs of RAM, and 1TB of storage.

events.title: Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra
events.description: The Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra is the headliner of the S23 series. Specifications are top-notch including 6.8-inch Dynamic AMOLED display with 120Hz refresh rate, Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processor, 5000mAh battery, up to 12gigs of RAM, and 1TB of storage.

events.title: Iphone 14 pro Max
events.description: The iPhone 14 Pro Max comes with 6.7-inch OLED display with 120Hz refresh rate and Apple's improved Bionic A16 processor. On the back there is a Triple camera setup with 48MP main camera.

events.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 5
events.description: The Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 5 comes with 7.6-inch Dynamic AMOLED display and with 6.2-inch cover screen. Specs also include Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processor, 4400mAh battery and Triple camera setup on the back.

events.title: Macbook pro m2
events.description: Apple 2022 MacBook Pro Laptop with M2 chip: 13-inch Retina Display, 8GB RAM, 256GB ​​​​​​​SSD ​​​​​​​Storage, Touch Bar, Backlit Keyboard, FaceTime HD Camera. Works with iPhone and iPad.

events.title: ASUS ROG Strix G15
events.description: The ROG Strix G15/17 embodies streamlined design, offering a formidable core experience for serious gaming and multitasking on Windows 10 Pro. Featuring up to the latest 10th Gen Intel® Core™ i7 CPU and a GeForce RTX™ 2070 SUPER GPU, it offers high-FPS power that takes full advantage of up to a blazing fast 240Hz/3ms display.

events.title: Xiaomi 13T Pro
events.description: The Xiaomi 13T Pro comes with 6.73-inch Dynamic AMOLED display. Specs also include Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processor, 5000mAh battery and Triple camera setup on the back .

events.title: Redmi note 12 pro 5g
events.description: Redmi Note 12 Pro 5G comes with a 120Hz Pro AMOLED Display with Dolby Atmos & Vision support. This combination along with HDR10+, a 1 billion color display, dual stereo speakers, and hi-res audio (wired & wireless) certification transforms your device into a wholesome multimedia package.
